- Added close action for looked-up wallet views across Arcade Game, Prize, and Gate pages.

## ðŸ“¦ Build & Release
- Android release pipeline now builds split APKs per ABI (`arm64-v8a`, `armeabi-v7a`, `x86_64`) instead of one universal APK.
- This reduces per-device download/install size significantly.

## ðŸ›  Stability
- Continued Android release signing/workflow hardening from prior fixes.

## Installation note
For most modern Android phones, install the `arm64-v8a` APK from this release.
